scripts.build: bun run --filter='*' build && bun run build:server:post
scripts.build:server:post: rm -rf packages/server/res && mkdir -p packages/server/res && cp node_modules/@sockethub/client/dist/sockethub-client.browser.js packages/server/res/sockethub-client.js && cp node_modules/@sockethub/client/dist/sockethub-client.min.js packages/server/res/sockethub-client.min.js && cp node_modules/socket.io-client/dist/socket.io.js packages/server/res/socket.io.js
scripts.dev: bun run build && cd packages/sockethub && bun run dev
scripts.docker:start: bun run docker:start:xmpp && docker compose up sockethub -d -e log_level=${LOG_LEVEL:-info}
scripts.docker:clean:all: bun run docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
scripts.docker:clean:sockethub: bun run docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1; docker rmi sockethub-sockethub
scripts.docker:build: bun run docker:clean:sockethub; bun run docker:start
scripts.integration: bun run docker:start && bun run integration:data-layer && bun run integration:browser && bun run integration:process
scripts.integration:browser: bun run integration:browser:basic && bun run integration:browser:multiclient && bun run integration:browser:reconnection && bun run integration:browser:resourceclash
scripts.lint: bunx biome check && bun run lint:doc
scripts.lint:fix: bunx biome check --write && bun run lint:doc:fix
